Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

Bought the game when the offer came up and I have totally fallen in love with it! I liked it so much I really wanted to get to know the games community and get involved in modding or any other facet of the game!

I'm till pretty new to the game but have orbited the Mun with a lander ready to go for a second attempt =D It feel so rewarding when you get it right.

Anyway, enough ranting. Looking forward to chatting with everyone.
You obviously suffer from "k" syndrome too, welcome to the club and congrats on the circumMÃƒÂ¼nar mission

Heh, the first thing I thought of was "Hmmmm.... intentional or accidental?" Kegal exercises, for those that don't have that bit of trivia stored in their mind somewhere. Then again, I think that is being pronounced incorrectly when pronounced like keagle would be, but oddly enough, that's how I've heard it pronounced more often. So it could be just me thinking that.

Ah, the dangers of "k" syndrome.
